attributes.action: Remove Rishi Sunak from prime minister we want a just government
attributes.additional_details: Because we want a fair government a just government a suitable person to run this role and be fair and just towards his uk citizens. Everybody in the Uk knows that Rishi is not the perfect fit for us as he cannot fulfill our basic needs or even if we need some type of help Rishi is really quick in rejecting or not accepting what we want as uk citizens.
attributes.background: To remove Rishi Sunak from his current position as he is not just and he is not the right fit for the government or not the right fit for uk citizens we want a fair government and just government we would someone who is fair and just towards his or her uk citizens

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for the Prime Minisiter to be removed.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
